comments.author: Patrol69
comments.body: If you don't want to see a member's post, you can ignore that member. Go to the profile of the member you want to ignore and then go to his post. After going to the post, there will be an option named Ignore at the bottom of his profile. If you want to ignore him, then you can click on the ignore option. If you click on the Ignore option then that member's post will no longer be visible to you.¬† It is not possible to create a list of people who are ignored because another member who you ignore may not ignore that member, ie each member's ignore list is usually different.
